title: Mimi is mistakenly describing Winston Churchill for quoting Muslims and minority rights.
text: It was not known that Winston Churchill was ashamed to make bold statements. But in today ' s world, online quote generators make it incredibly easy to attribute any statement to any historical personality without proper sources or documents. This is the case for a recently shared Mimi on Facebook who quotes the famous British leader, who says, "When minority Muslims are interested in minority rights, when they are in the majority there are no minority rights." Then one user wrote the article, "From Winston Churchill: An Undeniable Source."
